name: Remote Task Creation via ATSVC Named Pipe
description: Detects remote task creation via at.exe or API interacting with ATSVC namedpipe
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND event.code:5145 AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:\\\\\*\\IPC$ AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:atsvc AND winlog.event_data.Accesses:*WriteData*)`
